title: From Wall Street to Pizza to the King of Aganorsa Leaf Cigars - Eduardo Fernandez!
itunes:title: From Wall Street to Pizza to the King of Aganorsa Leaf Cigars - Eduardo Fernandez!
description:
This week on The Cigar Authority broadcasting live from the Toscano Sound Stage in Salem, New Hampshire... A pairing that cannot be beaten in Dave's personal opinion – Pizza and Cigars. One followed by the other or even at the same time! Today we are talking Pizza & Cigars with Dave's guest Eduardo Fernandez, owner & Founder of Aganorsa Cigars…

PLUS Barry recently rated the Alfonso Anejo #3 a whopping 102, but we have something to say about that and he might not like it!

We will fire up a the Aganorsa Leaf Validacion Corojo Gran Robusto from the Care Package as we smoke the Alfonso Anejo #3 is the second hour.

Join us for all of this and the usual suspects including the VS Question of the Week, Offer of the Day, Cigar News, The email of the week and a peek into the Asylum. The Cigar Authority is a member of the United Podcast Network and is recorded live in front of a studio audience at Studio 21 Podcast Cafe upstairs at Two Guys Smoke Shop in Salem, NH.

The Cigar Authority broadcasts live on Saturday at 12noon on our website, TheCigarAuthority.com as well as Facebook Live, YouTube and is available on your favorite podcast catcher.
